item.title: 1.0.1-beta.5
item.description:
1.0.1-beta.5: Localization & Performance Tuning

⚠️ Important Note: Due to essential internal changes in how Thaw manages menu bar items, your current icon positions will be reset to "Always Visible." I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience, but this manual re-adjustment is unavoidable to ensure future stability.

New Features:

  • Full Internationalization Support:
    • French Localization: Added French translations (81% translated).
    • Spanish Localization: Added full Spanish translations (81% translated).
    • Traditional Chinese: Added zh-Hant translations (81% translated).
    • Global Localizability: Refactored the codebase to wrap all user-facing strings in String(localized:), ensuring both AppKit and SwiftUI components translate correctly.
  • Diagnostic Logging: Added a new toggle in Advanced Settings to enable file-based logging. This helps troubleshoot "Unable to display menu bar items" issues on macOS 26 by tracking window discovery and image capture.

Improvements & Fixes:

  • Enhanced Image Caching:
    • Increased the maximum cache size from 50 to 200 to prevent icons from silently missing for power users.
    • Improved the LRU (Least Recently Used) eviction logic to skip sections currently being displayed, preventing "capture-then-evict" cycles.
  • Notched Display Support: Improved menu bar height detection with a new three-tier fallback (live query, cached value, or notch-aware default) to prevent icons from shrinking incorrectly on notched MacBooks.
  • Layout & Watchdog Stability:
    • Fine-tuned the cursor watchdog, extending the timeout to 6 seconds during layout drags to avoid premature cursor restoration.
    • Improved watchdog switch exhaustiveness and added automatic UI resets after a layout timeout.
  • Ultra-Wide Display Fix: Added invisible 9,999pt spacers for ultra-wide monitors (above 5k resolution) to ensure hidden items are pushed fully offscreen without hitting macOS status item limits.
  • Diagnostics Cleanup: The "Show Log Files in Finder" button and latest log filenames now remain visible even after logging is disabled, provided files exist on disk.
  • Temporary Item Logic: Added a grace period for non-standard popup windows to prevent them from rehiding instantly when window layer detection is uncertain.

1.0.1-beta.4: Localization & Control Item Refinement

item.title: 1.0.1-beta.3
item.description:
1.0.1-beta.3: Enhanced Precision & Localization

New Features:

  • Localization: Added a localization string catalog and integrated translatable languages into the project.
  • Layout Reset Recovery: Improved the reset process to automatically recover missing control items and recreate dividers by toggling the always-hidden section.

Improvements & Fixes:

  • Apple Menu Protection:
    • Added a target-relative guard band for macOS 14/15 and maintained AX-based guards for macOS 26+ to prevent accidental triggers.
    • Included extra padding to keep move events clear of the Apple menu region.
  • Icon Management:
    • Simplified temporary item placement to anchor reliably to the left of the Thaw icon, dropping fragile bounds calculations.
    • Ensured first-run or reset items remain hidden and do not leave blank icon slots.
    • New menu bar items are now relocated correctly during the first cache pass.
    • The image cache is now fully cleared during a layout reset to prevent stale icons.
  • System Stability:
    • Cursor Watchdog: Added an auto-show watchdog with a 2-second timeout to recover the pointer if it becomes stuck hidden.
    • Move Reliability: Thaw now refreshes menu bar bounds before moves and retries if window IDs are stale.
    • Concurrency: Updated internal semaphores to be cancellation-safe, ensuring move/click paths always signal even if interrupted.
  • UI Refinement: Removed overlay text during layout moves while maintaining the dim state for a cleaner look.

1.0.0: The Official Release

Thaw has reached its first stable milestone! This release consolidates all the progress from the beta period into a polished, reliable menu bar manager.

Latest Improvements (since beta 4):

  • Enhanced Reliability: Stabilized HIDEventManager logic to prevent "show on hover" and "show on click" from stopping after repeated use and prevent saving chevron divider position which could leave Thaw in an unusable state.
  • UI Polish: Condensed the menu bar tooltip for a cleaner look and added explicit double-click instructions.
  • System Safety: Improved thread safety by synchronizing access to the cursor hide count.
  • Apple Menu Fix: Refined synthetic press offsets to ensure Thaw never accidentally triggers the Apple menu.

Highlights from the Journey to 1.0:

  • The Big Thaw: Successfully forked and rebranded with a new identity, app icon, and independent bundle ID (com.stonerl.Thaw).
  • Ice Migration: Built-in support to import your old settings and control item positions from Ice.
  • Advanced Control: Introduced "Double-Click to Reveal" for always-hidden items and "Smart Rehide" strategies.
  • Modern macOS Support: Optimized for stability on macOS 26.
  • Performance: Faster icon caching, display-aware state refreshing, and thread-safe operations.

Known Issues:

If you are currently on macOS 14 or 15, please be aware that Thaw currently has some known bugs regarding temporary icons in the floating Thaw bar.

I am actively investigating these issues and will release a fix as soon as possible. You can track the progress of this issue here: GitHub Issue #1.

Thank you for all the feedback during the beta period that made this release possible!
